theBrewmaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theBrewmaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theBrewmaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theBrewmaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theBrewmaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theBrewmaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theBrewmaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theBrewmaster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theBrewmaster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theBrewmaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theBrewmaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theBrewmaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theBrewmaster:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.NAME: Celestial Brew
theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Discard your hand. NL Exhaust.
